home.name: Andres Uribe
home.title: Web Developer
home.description: I am a systems engineer with experience in data analysis and software development to solve geospatial challenges. Skilled in data processing with Python, C++, and SQL, using tools such as pandas, numpy, scipy, or-tools, among others. Extensive experience in web development using technologies like Angular, Node.js, FastAPI, and React.

contact.name: Name
contact.policy: I agree to the processing of my personal data in accordance with the privacy policy.

beatride.title: Beatride â€“ Commercial and Logistics Routing Platform
beatride.description: Beatride is a platform focused on optimizing Route to Market (RTM), enabling efficient route creation for commercial and logistics teams. I participated in frontend development with Angular and optimized Google Maps integration. I also developed backend scripts in C++ (using OR-Tools) and integrated with Python through ctypes, to perform logistics calculations based on geospatial data.

fampas.title: FAMPAS - Santander Elderly and Parkinson Foundation
fampas.description: Development of the institutional website frontend using Angular. I implemented reusable components, responsive styles in SCSS, and modular route management. Docker was used for consistent development environments and simplified deployment
